meeting_info.organization: Tax Increment Financing Reinvestment Zone Number Fourteen Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
Cameron Anderson, P.E., Program Manager, Department of Transportation and Public Works
Susan Morgan, Chair, Skillman Corridor TIF District Board of Directors

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 4 through 6.
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the December 6, 2024, Skillman Corridor TIF District Board Meeting.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a request by the City’s Department of Transportation and Public Works for a dedication of up to $1,100,000 in the Skillman Corridor TIF District district-wide set-aside funds.
agenda_items.description: To support the construction of median improvements and parkway edge landscaping on Skillman Street between Church Road and Sedgwick Street in accordance with the Lake Highlands Public Improvement District (“LHPID”) Skillman Street Master Plan.
agenda_items.presenter: Cameron Anderson, P.E., Program Manager, Department of Transportation and Public Works
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of Approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and discuss updates to the 2009 Skillman Corridor TIF District Strategic Implementation Plan.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development and Susan Morgan, Chair, Skillman Corridor TIF District Board of Directors

financial_items.description: Dedication of funds to support construction of median improvements and landscaping.
